tools.byte-order.title: Byte Order Converter
tools.byte-order.description: Convert between Big Endian and Little Endian
tools.byte-order.aboutDesc: Endianness refers to the order in which multi-byte data is stored in memory. Big Endian stores the most significant byte at the lowest address, while Little Endian stores the least significant byte at the lowest address. x86/x64 architectures use Little Endian, while network protocols typically use Big Endian.
